content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":262612,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市は魔軍に制圧された","translatedEnglishLine":"The Free City has been conquered by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":262613,"originalJapaneseLine":"フレイアが報告に現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Freya appears to report."},{"lineNumber":262614,"originalJapaneseLine":"捕虜にしていたカチューシャが逃げた","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha, who was held captive, has escaped."},{"lineNumber":262615,"originalJapaneseLine":"闇社会がランスの敵になった","translatedEnglishLine":"The underworld has become an enemy of Rance."},{"lineNumber":262616,"originalJapaneseLine":"準備フェイズのイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Preparation phase event."},{"lineNumber":262617,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、ランスが文句いっている・・","translatedEnglishLine":"At Rance Castle, Rance is complaining..."},{"lineNumber":262618,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんで俺様が行動を選択出来ないのだ、世界を守る為に今回はやるべき事を考えていたのにー","translatedEnglishLine":"Why can't I choose my actions? I was thinking about what I should do this time to protect the world—"},{"lineNumber":262619,"originalJapaneseLine":"申し訳ございません。","translatedEnglishLine":"I am very sorry."},{"lineNumber":262620,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＤＸの会による妨害工作が行われており、我々の行動が制限されてしまいました。","translatedEnglishLine":"The DX Association is carrying out sabotage, and our actions have been restricted."},{"lineNumber":262621,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＤＸの会？　ああ、カチューシャの率いる裏組織か。","translatedEnglishLine":"The DX Association? Ah, the underground organization led by Katyusha, right?"},{"lineNumber":262622,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様に強い反感を持っており、組織をあげて破壊工作をしています・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They have strong resentment toward Lord Rance and are conducting sabotage with the entire organization..."},{"lineNumber":262623,"originalJapaneseLine":"内容については、何かそれっぽいのを頼みます","translatedEnglishLine":"As for the content, please make it something plausible."},{"lineNumber":262624,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　カチューシャの妨害工作。最大3回発生、ＤＸの会撲滅に成功していると無し","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha's sabotage. Happens up to 3 times; if the DX Association is eradicated, none occur."},{"lineNumber":262625,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ランスの悪評をばらまくとか。","translatedEnglishLine":"They spread bad rumors about Rance, for example."},{"lineNumber":262626,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　あの総統、実は魔軍とつるんでマッチポンプで好き放題してるとか。","translatedEnglishLine":"That dictator is actually colluding with the demon army, orchestrating things to do as he pleases."},{"lineNumber":262627,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　そういえばだいぶ私腹を肥やしてるって聞いたぜ。とか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Come to think of it, I heard he's been fattening his own pockets quite a bit."},{"lineNumber":262628,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　これにより、準備フェイズの貴重なコマンドが使えなくなるのがデメリットです。","translatedEnglishLine":"The disadvantage is that valuable commands in the preparation phase become unusable."},{"lineNumber":262629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　そのターンの選択がこれしか出なくなる","translatedEnglishLine":"Only this choice will be available during that turn."},{"lineNumber":262630,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ゲーム上、かなりきついデメリットとなります","translatedEnglishLine":"In-game, this is a fairly harsh disadvantage."},{"lineNumber":262631,"originalJapaneseLine":"で・・これは、しばらく続くのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"So... will this continue for a while?"},{"lineNumber":262632,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ大丈夫です、我々も全人類をあげてＤＸの会に対して防衛をしているので","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it's okay. We are also defending against the DX Association with the efforts of all humanity."},{"lineNumber":262633,"originalJapaneseLine":"今回を凌げばしばらくは抑えられるはずです。","translatedEnglishLine":"If we get through this, it should be suppressed for a while."},{"lineNumber":262634,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、この数日を失っただけでも痛い所です。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, losing these few days is painful."},{"lineNumber":262635,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・うむむ、カチューシャめ、逃がすのでなかったか","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hmm, that Katyusha, we shouldn't have let her escape."},{"lineNumber":262636,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＤＸの会、妨害Ａのアレンジです。","translatedEnglishLine":"DX Association, sabotage A arrangement."},{"lineNumber":262637,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＤＸの会の妨害工作で、このターンを失います","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to sabotage by the DX Association, you will lose this turn."},{"lineNumber":262638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":262639,"originalJapaneseLine":"カチューシャはランスが倒して死んでバージョンです。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the version where Rance defeated and killed Katyusha."},{"lineNumber":262640,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＤＸの会だと、カチューシャは倒したはずだぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"If it's the DX Association, Katyusha should have been defeated."},{"lineNumber":262641,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、確かにボスであったカチューシャはいなくなりましたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, the boss Katyusha is indeed gone,"},{"lineNumber":262642,"originalJapaneseLine":"それにより新たなボスが決まったようです。","translatedEnglishLine":"but it seems a new boss has taken her place."},{"lineNumber":262643,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼の名は、ズッキーニ・アウトバーンという男です。（適当、なんでもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"His name is a man called Zucchini Outbahn. (Arbitrary, it could be anything.)"},{"lineNumber":262644,"originalJapaneseLine":"別にカチューシャに忠誠を誓っていた訳ではないようだが、カチューシャの敵を討つという名目で","translatedEnglishLine":"He didn’t seem to have sworn loyalty to Katyusha, but under the pretense of avenging her,"},{"lineNumber":262645,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボスとしての地位を勝ち取ったようです。","translatedEnglishLine":"he appears to have claimed the position of boss."},{"lineNumber":262646,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類が魔人達の大決戦をしているこの最中に、同じ人類側の組織から","translatedEnglishLine":"In the midst of humanity’s great battle against the demons, to receive sabotage from an organization on the human side..."},{"lineNumber":262647,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな妨害を受ける事になるとは・・うんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"To think we would suffer such obstruction... and so on."},{"lineNumber":262648,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中・・","translatedEnglishLine":"During battle..."},{"lineNumber":262649,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、ランス様とシィルが語りかける","translatedEnglishLine":"Sil talks to Lord Rance, calling out \"Lord Rance, Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":262650,"originalJapaneseLine":"この忙しい時になんだ、黙ってろ","translatedEnglishLine":"What is it at such a busy time? Be quiet."},{"lineNumber":262651,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ、その前にホラガさんの所に行った時にケイブリスの弱点を","translatedEnglishLine":"No, before that, when we went to Horaga's place, the weakness of Cavebris was..."},{"lineNumber":262652,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・あっ、そういえば聞いたな、思い出した","translatedEnglishLine":"...Ah, now that you mention it, I heard that. I remember."},{"lineNumber":262653,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、弱点を狙うぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's target the weakness."},{"lineNumber":262654,"originalJapaneseLine":"割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event: since it is an addition, it can be brief."},{"lineNumber":262655,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃・・　マルグリッド迷宮","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile... in the Marguerite Labyrinth."},{"lineNumber":262656,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵を叩き斬るダークランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Rance slashes through monster soldiers."},{"lineNumber":262657,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、これであいつが踏破してきたのと同じ階だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, now this is the same floor that guy reached."},{"lineNumber":262658,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、さようで・・と案内役のハニー（雇われ道案内）","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, that's correct... says Honey, the guide (a hired guide)."},{"lineNumber":262659,"originalJapaneseLine":"次の階に進みますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we proceed to the next floor?"},{"lineNumber":262660,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、いい、あいつと同じ場所までこれたらそれでいい","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it's fine. As long as I can reach the same place as that guy, that's enough."},{"lineNumber":262661,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、と、メモを取り出して踏破した所に×印を付ける・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, then, I take out my notes and mark an X where I have cleared..."},{"lineNumber":262662,"originalJapaneseLine":"後少しだな、今に見てろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Just a little more. Just you wait."},{"lineNumber":262663,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":262664,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":262665,"originalJapaneseLine":"回想ぽく","translatedEnglishLine":"(Like a flashback)"},{"lineNumber":262666,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの男を倒し、かぁさんを助け出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat that man and rescue my mother."},{"lineNumber":262667,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、あの男は、幾多の冒険を経た強者だ、今の俺ではかなわない","translatedEnglishLine":"But that man is a strong warrior who has experienced many adventures; I can't beat him as I am now."},{"lineNumber":262668,"originalJapaneseLine":"圧倒的な経験の差だ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's an overwhelming difference in experience."},{"lineNumber":262669,"originalJapaneseLine":"追いつくためには、俺も同じ経験を積めばいい","translatedEnglishLine":"To catch up, I just need to gain the same experience."},{"lineNumber":262670,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの男が踏破した迷宮、倒したモンスター、全てクリアして越えてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will clear and surpass every labyrinth that man traversed and every monster he defeated."},{"lineNumber":262671,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれから・・１年","translatedEnglishLine":"Since then... one year has passed."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市は魔軍に制圧された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free City has been conquered by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フレイアが報告に現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Freya appears to report.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕虜にしていたカチューシャが逃げた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha, who was held captive, has escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闇社会がランスの敵になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The underworld has become an enemy of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備フェイズのイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Preparation phase event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、ランスが文句いっている・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance Castle, Rance is complaining...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで俺様が行動を選択出来ないのだ、世界を守る為に今回はやるべき事を考えていたのにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why can't I choose my actions? I was thinking about what I should do this time to protect the world—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 申し訳ございません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am very sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会による妨害工作が行われており、我々の行動が制限されてしまいました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The DX Association is carrying out sabotage, and our actions have been restricted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会？　ああ、カチューシャの率いる裏組織か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The DX Association? Ah, the underground organization led by Katyusha, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に強い反感を持っており、組織をあげて破壊工作をしています・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have strong resentment toward Lord Rance and are conducting sabotage with the entire organization...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容については、何かそれっぽいのを頼みます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for the content, please make it something plausible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャの妨害工作。最大3回発生、ＤＸの会撲滅に成功していると無し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha's sabotage. Happens up to 3 times; if the DX Association is eradicated, none occur.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの悪評をばらまくとか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They spread bad rumors about Rance, for example.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの総統、実は魔軍とつるんでマッチポンプで好き放題してるとか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That dictator is actually colluding with the demon army, orchestrating things to do as he pleases.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえばだいぶ私腹を肥やしてるって聞いたぜ。とか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, I heard he's been fattening his own pockets quite a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより、準備フェイズの貴重なコマンドが使えなくなるのがデメリットです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The disadvantage is that valuable commands in the preparation phase become unusable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのターンの選択がこれしか出なくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only this choice will be available during that turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゲーム上、かなりきついデメリットとなります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In-game, this is a fairly harsh disadvantage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で・・これは、しばらく続くのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So... will this continue for a while?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ大丈夫です、我々も全人類をあげてＤＸの会に対して防衛をしているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's okay. We are also defending against the DX Association with the efforts of all humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回を凌げばしばらくは抑えられるはずです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we get through this, it should be suppressed for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、この数日を失っただけでも痛い所です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, losing these few days is painful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・うむむ、カチューシャめ、逃がすのでなかったか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hmm, that Katyusha, we shouldn't have let her escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会、妨害Ａのアレンジです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: DX Association, sabotage A arrangement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会の妨害工作で、このターンを失います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to sabotage by the DX Association, you will lose this turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャはランスが倒して死んでバージョンです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the version where Rance defeated and killed Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会だと、カチューシャは倒したはずだぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's the DX Association, Katyusha should have been defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、確かにボスであったカチューシャはいなくなりましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, the boss Katyusha is indeed gone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにより新たなボスが決まったようです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems a new boss has taken her place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼の名は、ズッキーニ・アウトバーンという男です。（適当、なんでもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His name is a man called Zucchini Outbahn. (Arbitrary, it could be anything.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にカチューシャに忠誠を誓っていた訳ではないようだが、カチューシャの敵を討つという名目で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He didn’t seem to have sworn loyalty to Katyusha, but under the pretense of avenging her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボスとしての地位を勝ち取ったようです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he appears to have claimed the position of boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類が魔人達の大決戦をしているこの最中に、同じ人類側の組織から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the midst of humanity’s great battle against the demons, to receive sabotage from an organization on the human side...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな妨害を受ける事になるとは・・うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think we would suffer such obstruction... and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ランス様とシィルが語りかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil talks to Lord Rance, calling out "Lord Rance, Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この忙しい時になんだ、黙ってろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is it at such a busy time? Be quiet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、その前にホラガさんの所に行った時にケイブリスの弱点を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, before that, when we went to Horaga's place, the weakness of Cavebris was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・あっ、そういえば聞いたな、思い出した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ah, now that you mention it, I heard that. I remember.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、弱点を狙うぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's target the weakness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event: since it is an addition, it can be brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃・・　マルグリッド迷宮
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile... in the Marguerite Labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵を叩き斬るダークランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Rance slashes through monster soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、これであいつが踏破してきたのと同じ階だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, now this is the same floor that guy reached.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、さようで・・と案内役のハニー（雇われ道案内）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, that's correct... says Honey, the guide (a hired guide).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の階に進みますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we proceed to the next floor?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、いい、あいつと同じ場所までこれたらそれでいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's fine. As long as I can reach the same place as that guy, that's enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、と、メモを取り出して踏破した所に×印を付ける・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, then, I take out my notes and mark an X where I have cleared...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後少しだな、今に見てろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a little more. Just you wait.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回想ぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Like a flashback)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの男を倒し、かぁさんを助け出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat that man and rescue my mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、あの男は、幾多の冒険を経た強者だ、今の俺ではかなわない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that man is a strong warrior who has experienced many adventures; I can't beat him as I am now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な経験の差だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's an overwhelming difference in experience.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いつくためには、俺も同じ経験を積めばいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To catch up, I just need to gain the same experience.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの男が踏破した迷宮、倒したモンスター、全てクリアして越えてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will clear and surpass every labyrinth that man traversed and every monster he defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから・・１年
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then... one year has passed.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Just you wait."},{"lineNumber":262663,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":262664,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":262665,"originalJapaneseLine":"回想ぽく","translatedEnglishLine":"(Like a flashback)"},{"lineNumber":262666,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの男を倒し、かぁさんを助け出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat that man and rescue my mother."},{"lineNumber":262667,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、あの男は、幾多の冒険を経た強者だ、今の俺ではかなわない","translatedEnglishLine":"But that man is a strong warrior who has experienced many adventures; I can't beat him as I am now."},{"lineNumber":262668,"originalJapaneseLine":"圧倒的な経験の差だ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's an overwhelming difference in experience."},{"lineNumber":262669,"originalJapaneseLine":"追いつくためには、俺も同じ経験を積めばいい","translatedEnglishLine":"To catch up, I just need to gain the same experience."},{"lineNumber":262670,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの男が踏破した迷宮、倒したモンスター、全てクリアして越えてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will clear and surpass every labyrinth that man traversed and every monster he defeated."},{"lineNumber":262671,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれから・・１年","translatedEnglishLine":"Since then... one year has passed."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市は魔軍に制圧された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free City has been conquered by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フレイアが報告に現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Freya appears to report.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕虜にしていたカチューシャが逃げた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha, who was held captive, has escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闇社会がランスの敵になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The underworld has become an enemy of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備フェイズのイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Preparation phase event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、ランスが文句いっている・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance Castle, Rance is complaining...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで俺様が行動を選択出来ないのだ、世界を守る為に今回はやるべき事を考えていたのにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why can't I choose my actions? I was thinking about what I should do this time to protect the world—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 申し訳ございません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am very sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会による妨害工作が行われており、我々の行動が制限されてしまいました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The DX Association is carrying out sabotage, and our actions have been restricted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会？　ああ、カチューシャの率いる裏組織か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The DX Association? Ah, the underground organization led by Katyusha, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に強い反感を持っており、組織をあげて破壊工作をしています・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have strong resentment toward Lord Rance and are conducting sabotage with the entire organization...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容については、何かそれっぽいのを頼みます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for the content, please make it something plausible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャの妨害工作。最大3回発生、ＤＸの会撲滅に成功していると無し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha's sabotage. Happens up to 3 times; if the DX Association is eradicated, none occur.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの悪評をばらまくとか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They spread bad rumors about Rance, for example.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの総統、実は魔軍とつるんでマッチポンプで好き放題してるとか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That dictator is actually colluding with the demon army, orchestrating things to do as he pleases.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえばだいぶ私腹を肥やしてるって聞いたぜ。とか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, I heard he's been fattening his own pockets quite a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより、準備フェイズの貴重なコマンドが使えなくなるのがデメリットです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The disadvantage is that valuable commands in the preparation phase become unusable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのターンの選択がこれしか出なくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only this choice will be available during that turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゲーム上、かなりきついデメリットとなります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In-game, this is a fairly harsh disadvantage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で・・これは、しばらく続くのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So... will this continue for a while?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ大丈夫です、我々も全人類をあげてＤＸの会に対して防衛をしているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's okay. We are also defending against the DX Association with the efforts of all humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回を凌げばしばらくは抑えられるはずです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we get through this, it should be suppressed for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、この数日を失っただけでも痛い所です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, losing these few days is painful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・うむむ、カチューシャめ、逃がすのでなかったか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hmm, that Katyusha, we shouldn't have let her escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会、妨害Ａのアレンジです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: DX Association, sabotage A arrangement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会の妨害工作で、このターンを失います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to sabotage by the DX Association, you will lose this turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャはランスが倒して死んでバージョンです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the version where Rance defeated and killed Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会だと、カチューシャは倒したはずだぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's the DX Association, Katyusha should have been defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、確かにボスであったカチューシャはいなくなりましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, the boss Katyusha is indeed gone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにより新たなボスが決まったようです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems a new boss has taken her place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼の名は、ズッキーニ・アウトバーンという男です。（適当、なんでもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His name is a man called Zucchini Outbahn. (Arbitrary, it could be anything.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にカチューシャに忠誠を誓っていた訳ではないようだが、カチューシャの敵を討つという名目で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He didn’t seem to have sworn loyalty to Katyusha, but under the pretense of avenging her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボスとしての地位を勝ち取ったようです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he appears to have claimed the position of boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類が魔人達の大決戦をしているこの最中に、同じ人類側の組織から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the midst of humanity’s great battle against the demons, to receive sabotage from an organization on the human side...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな妨害を受ける事になるとは・・うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think we would suffer such obstruction... and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ランス様とシィルが語りかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil talks to Lord Rance, calling out "Lord Rance, Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この忙しい時になんだ、黙ってろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is it at such a busy time? Be quiet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、その前にホラガさんの所に行った時にケイブリスの弱点を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, before that, when we went to Horaga's place, the weakness of Cavebris was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・あっ、そういえば聞いたな、思い出した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ah, now that you mention it, I heard that. I remember.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、弱点を狙うぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's target the weakness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event: since it is an addition, it can be brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃・・　マルグリッド迷宮
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile... in the Marguerite Labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵を叩き斬るダークランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Rance slashes through monster soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、これであいつが踏破してきたのと同じ階だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, now this is the same floor that guy reached.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、さようで・・と案内役のハニー（雇われ道案内）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, that's correct... says Honey, the guide (a hired guide).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の階に進みますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we proceed to the next floor?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、いい、あいつと同じ場所までこれたらそれでいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's fine. As long as I can reach the same place as that guy, that's enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、と、メモを取り出して踏破した所に×印を付ける・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, then, I take out my notes and mark an X where I have cleared...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後少しだな、今に見てろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a little more. Just you wait.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回想ぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Like a flashback)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの男を倒し、かぁさんを助け出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat that man and rescue my mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、あの男は、幾多の冒険を経た強者だ、今の俺ではかなわない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that man is a strong warrior who has experienced many adventures; I can't beat him as I am now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な経験の差だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's an overwhelming difference in experience.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いつくためには、俺も同じ経験を積めばいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To catch up, I just need to gain the same experience.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの男が踏破した迷宮、倒したモンスター、全てクリアして越えてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will clear and surpass every labyrinth that man traversed and every monster he defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから・・１年
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then... one year has passed.
